REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f1865 reute b f BC-/-FED-WILL-BUY-BILLS 03-30 0075

TEXT.TITLE: FED WILL BUY BILLS FOR CUSTOMER AFTER AUCTION
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Reserve said it will enter the U.S. Government securities market after the 1300 EST weekly bill auction to purchase around 900 mln dlrs of Treasury bills for customers, a spokesman said. He said the Fed will purchase bills with maturities from May through September 10. Dealers said Federal funds were trading at 6-3/8 pct when the Fed announced the operation. Reuter
